data.title: Orthopedist Fri-Ortho Fribourg - Practice
data.meta_description: Contact othopedic practice Fribourg: Located in the heart of Fribourg, our practice is opposite to the railway station. +41(0)263231951 www.fri-ortho.ch
data.text:
The practice

Your appointment

Our competent and friendly team – consisting of practice nurse, medical secretary and radiographer - will be happy to take care of you.

All our staff speaks English, French and German.

By using modern equipment and due to a long-standing professional collaboration your waiting period will be as short as possible.

Appointments & Consultations

For an appointment or consultation, please call us directly at:

Opening times

Monday - Wednesday 8.00 a.m. - 12.00 p.m. / 2.00 p.m. - 6.00 p.m.

Thursday - Friday 8.00 a.m. - 12.00 p.m.

For general questions, use our contact form.

How to find us

Situated in the city-center of Fribourg the practice is located just in front of the railway station. You may easily reach us by train, bus, taxi or car. Several public parking lots are close by (Rex – Boulevard Perolles, Coop – Grand Places).

You’ll find us on the third floor – a lift and automatic doors facilitate the access.

Up-to-date:

2021

Advanced training diploma in orthopedic surgery and traumatology of the musculoskeletal system.

2020

Starting from 01.08.2019 Mrs Becker, technicien in radiology replaces Mrs Gex who retires after having been working for the practice since 2009. We would like to thank her for the very valuable work all the years and whish all the best for her retirement.

25.03.2020

From 25.03.2020, we collaborate with the hospital One Day Surgery (1DS) in Fribourg for the ambulatory chirugical treatment of patients.

Dès 03.2020

Due to the situation caused by the pandemic of Coronavirus (Covid-19), the treatments have been reduced following the directives of OFSP. For more information, please call us.

2019-2021

Guaranteed reimbursement:

Certification of guaranteed reimbursement with supplementary insurance
